we spent a lot of time visiting cave

lived in these troglodyte dwellings we
visited Casa garota the sassy district

is made up of a network of dwellings

valley and many of these homes were
inhabited up until the 1950s when the

government relocated the population to
modern developments in the city

walking into the Casa grata we were able

looked like there's an audio recording
